title: Reciple
description:
Reciple is a simple [Discord.js](https://discord.js.org) handler that just works! To install run the following command in your terminal:
```
npm i reciple
```

title: E Player
description: E player is a simple music bot made with [FalloutStudios/Reciple](https://github.com/FalloutStudios/Reciple) and [Androz2091/discord-player](https://github.com/Androz2091/discord-player). E Player is made for multi guild and single guild with all common music commands.

title: Discord.js pagination
description: An interaction based pagination library for Discord.js written in TypeScript

title: Axis
description: Axis is a Discord bot that loads modules that contains commands and other functions to easily build your bot by adding those scrips made for your supported Axis version.

title: HiddenPlayer
description: HiddenPlayer is an afk bot that makes a non 24/7 server online for a long time. This was originally used for a server but shortly removed as it's a breach to the hosting TOS.

title: Fallout Utility
description: A utility module used for Fallout projects. This includes the main logger of Axis bot and some other utilities. This is still in development and is not meant to be used for anything else.
